A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very disappointing. While Mark Hamill is great\, Luke Skywalker is completely out of character. The so called massive galaxy-spanning conflict feels completely insignificant and small scaled. Many sub plots are completely unnecessary and full of fluff. And the payoff on Snoke and Rey that fans have been waiting two years for is completely ridiculous. The music is not as special and epic as it used to be and the general direction the story is taking is entirely uninteresting.
